data.name: smb-databases-package
data.workflow_syntax:
package "setup_smb_databases" {
    use = "@jelou-marketplace/smb-databases-package:1.0.1"
    inputs = {}  // Creates a single "Pedidos" database
    variable = "database_setup_result"
    next = "process_setup_result"
    next_failed = "handle_setup_error"
}

inputs.name: orderDatabases
inputs.description: List of order database names separated by commas. If not provided, creates a single database called 'Pedidos'

data.usage: This package automates the creation and configuration of SMB (Small and Medium Business) databases in Jelou AI. It verifies the existence of order databases (single or multiple based on configuration) and "Cliente" database, creates them if they don't exist, and configures the current user profile.

data.name: package-conversational-eco

inputs.name: nativeCatalog
inputs.description: Use native catalog vs Facebook catalog

data.usage: An e-commerce conversational agent package for WhatsApp and Web that allows customers to browse products, manage shopping carts and place orders through natural conversations. Supports both Facebook Catalog API integration and native catalog management.

data.name: payment-in-chat-package

inputs.name: provider
inputs.description: Required. Values: STRIPE, NUVEI, POCKET, POCKET_MEX, DATAFAST, PAYPHONE

inputs.name: taxableAmount
inputs.description: Amount to be taxed (for PAYMENT type)

data.usage: This package automates the complete setup of in-chat payments for Jelou AI. It configures payment providers, obtains company and client data, builds payment requests, and executes a conversational AI assistant that handles payment flows with secure forms.
